mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where your every whim is our command! Join us now and experience a life of limitless privilege!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: ---Ah, let me regale you with a tale of the time I, the esteemed Hot Josh, was vacationing on my private island oasis. As I sipped champagne under the shade of my diamond-encrusted umbrella, a mere inconvenience disrupted my tranquility.A paltry mosquito dared to land on my flawless skin, disrupting the perfect balance of my serene surroundings. In a fit of entitlement, I summoned my personal entourage to rid me of this pestilent creature post-haste.But alas, their feeble attempts fell short of my lofty expectations. Outraged by their incompetence, I demanded the mosquito be captured and brought before me for a trial. In a dramatic courtroom scene, I presided as judge, jury, and executioner over this tiny trespasser. The mosquito, trembling before my divine presence, was found guilty of disrupting my blissful repose.As punishment, I decreed that the mosquito be banished from the island immediately. My loyal staff scrambled to fulfill my command, escorting the insect off the premises with great fanfare.Satisfied by the swift execution of justice, I reclined once more in my opulent surroundings, secure in the knowledge that my realm of entitlement remained untarnished. For in the kingdom of Hot Josh, even the tiniest annoyances must bow before my will.
